https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=3196e2d960ec6dc3fed56b806f8bb3fb

Finally const strs and panic-free runtime strings without ugly hacks. Miri doesn't complain but human reviews are welcome.

fn write_to_array(&self, dst: &mut[u8; MAX_LEN]) -> usize could be used to reduce unsafe but I prefer write_unaligned.
